amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for implementation of an executive order which requires all companies bidding on Federal contracts to disclose all Federal campaign contributions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds be used to implement any rule, regulation, or executive order regarding the disclosure of political contributions that takes effect on or after the date of enactment of the this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A057) Agreed to by recorded vote: 256 - 170 (Roll no. 522).
